title: Rep. Jim Jordan Live: Demands Answers from FBI
itunes:title: Rep. Jim Jordan Live: Demands Answers from FBI
description: Representative Jim Jordan joins the broadcast live today to demand answers from the FBI for recent arrests targeting conservatives. Jay, Jordan, and the rest of the Sekulow team discuss. Senior Advisor for National Security and Foreign Policy Ric Grenell also joins. This and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: Representative Jim Jordan joins the broadcast live today to demand answers from the FBI for recent arrests targeting conservatives. Jay, Jordan, and the rest of the Sekulow team discuss. Senior Advisor for National Security and Foreign Policy Ric Grenell also joins. This and more today on Sekulow.
